2025-08-01 21:56:53.189 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (12ms) [Parameters=[@__Parse_0='?' (DbType = Guid)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT p1."Id", p1."CreatedDate", p1."Name", p1."Price", p1."Stock", p1."UpdatedDate", s."ProductImageFilesId", s."ProductsId", s."Id", s."CreatedDate", s."Discriminator", s."FileName", s."Path", s."Storage", s."Showcase"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."CreatedDate", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    WHERE p."Id" = @__Parse_0
    LIMIT 1
) AS p1
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId", f0."Id", f0."CreatedDate", f0."Discriminator", f0."FileName", f0."Path", f0."Storage", f0."Showcase"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS f0 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = f0."Id"
) AS s ON p1."Id" = s."ProductsId"
ORDER BY p1."Id", s."ProductImageFilesId", s."ProductsId"

2025-08-01 21:57:17.028 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[@__Parse_0='?' (DbType = Guid)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT p1."Id", p1."CreatedDate", p1."Name", p1."Price", p1."Stock", p1."UpdatedDate", s."ProductImageFilesId", s."ProductsId", s."Id", s."CreatedDate", s."Discriminator", s."FileName", s."Path", s."Storage", s."Showcase"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."CreatedDate", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    WHERE p."Id" = @__Parse_0
    LIMIT 1
) AS p1
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId", f0."Id", f0."CreatedDate", f0."Discriminator", f0."FileName", f0."Path", f0."Storage", f0."Showcase"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS f0 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = f0."Id"
) AS s ON p1."Id" = s."ProductsId"
ORDER BY p1."Id", s."ProductImageFilesId", s."ProductsId"

    FROM "Products" AS p
    WHERE p."Id" = @__Parse_0
    LIMIT 1
) AS p1
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId", f0."Id", f0."CreatedDate", f0."Discriminator", f0."FileName", f0."Path", f0."Storage", f0."Showcase"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"

2025-08-03 23:32:04.764 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (15ms) [Parameters=[@__Parse_0='?' (DbType = Guid)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT p1."Id", p1."CreatedDate", p1."Name", p1."Price", p1."Stock", p1."UpdatedDate", s."ProductImageFilesId", s."ProductsId", s."Id", s."CreatedDate", s."Discriminator", s."FileName", s."Path", s."Storage", s."Showcase"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."CreatedDate", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    WHERE p."Id" = @__Parse_0
    LIMIT 1
) AS p1
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId", f0."Id", f0."CreatedDate", f0."Discriminator", f0."FileName", f0."Path", f0."Storage", f0."Showcase"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS f0 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = f0."Id"
) AS s ON p1."Id" = s."ProductsId"
ORDER BY p1."Id", s."ProductImageFilesId", s."ProductsId"

SELECT p1."Id", p1."CreatedDate", p1."Name", p1."Price", p1."Stock", p1."UpdatedDate", s."ProductImageFilesId", s."ProductsId", s."Id", s."CreatedDate", s."Discriminator", s."FileName", s."Path", s."Storage", s."Showcase"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."CreatedDate", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    WHERE p."Id" = @__Parse_0
    LIMIT 1
) AS p1
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId", f0."Id", f0."CreatedDate", f0."Discriminator", f0."FileName", f0."Path", f0."Storage", f0."Showcase"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS f0 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = f0."Id"
) AS s ON p1."Id" = s."ProductsId"

    SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase", s."Id" AS "Id0", s."CreatedDate" AS "CreatedDate0", s."Name", s."Price", s."Stock", s."UpdatedDate", s."ProductImageFilesId", s."ProductsId"

2025-08-04 00:07:39.686 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (8ms) [Parameters=[@__Parse_0='?' (DbType = Guid)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT p1."Id", p1."CreatedDate", p1."Name", p1."Price", p1."Stock", p1."UpdatedDate", s."ProductImageFilesId", s."ProductsId", s."Id", s."CreatedDate", s."Discriminator", s."FileName", s."Path", s."Storage", s."Showcase"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."CreatedDate", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    WHERE p."Id" = @__Parse_0
    LIMIT 1
) AS p1
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId", f0."Id", f0."CreatedDate", f0."Discriminator", f0."FileName", f0."Path", f0."Storage", f0."Showcase"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS f0 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = f0."Id"
) AS s ON p1."Id" = s."ProductsId"
ORDER BY p1."Id", s."ProductImageFilesId", s."ProductsId"

2025-08-04 00:14:41.818 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT p1."Id", p1."Name", p1."Price", p1."Stock", p1."CreatedDate", p1."UpdatedDate", s."Id", s."CreatedDate", s."Discriminator", s."FileName", s."Path", s."Storage", s."Showcase", s."ProductImageFilesId", s."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS p1
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT f0."Id", f0."CreatedDate", f0."Discriminator", f0."FileName", f0."Path", f0."Storage", f0."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS f0 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = f0."Id"
) AS s ON p1."Id" = s."ProductsId"
ORDER BY p1."Id", s."ProductImageFilesId", s."ProductsId"

2025-08-04 00:26:32.505 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT count(*)::int
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-08-04 00:26:32.512 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT p1."Id", p1."Name", p1."Price", p1."Stock", p1."CreatedDate", p1."UpdatedDate", s."Id", s."CreatedDate", s."Discriminator", s."FileName", s."Path", s."Storage", s."Showcase", s."ProductImageFilesId", s."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS p1
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT f0."Id", f0."CreatedDate", f0."Discriminator", f0."FileName", f0."Path", f0."Storage", f0."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS f0 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = f0."Id"
) AS s ON p1."Id" = s."ProductsId"
ORDER BY p1."Id", s."ProductImageFilesId", s."ProductsId"

) AS p1

2025-08-04 00:33:25.740 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (4ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT count(*)::int
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-08-04 00:33:25.749 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (5ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT p1."Id", p1."Name", p1."Price", p1."Stock", p1."CreatedDate", p1."UpdatedDate", s."Id", s."CreatedDate", s."Discriminator", s."FileName", s."Path", s."Storage", s."Showcase", s."ProductImageFilesId", s."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS p1
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT f0."Id", f0."CreatedDate", f0."Discriminator", f0."FileName", f0."Path", f0."Storage", f0."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS f0 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = f0."Id"
) AS s ON p1."Id" = s."ProductsId"
ORDER BY p1."Id", s."ProductImageFilesId", s."ProductsId"

SELECT count(*)::int
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-08-04 00:38:43.564 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (6ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT p1."Id", p1."Name", p1."Price", p1."Stock", p1."CreatedDate", p1."UpdatedDate", s."Id", s."CreatedDate", s."Discriminator", s."FileName", s."Path", s."Storage", s."Showcase", s."ProductImageFilesId", s."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS p1
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT f0."Id", f0."CreatedDate", f0."Discriminator", f0."FileName", f0."Path", f0."Storage", f0."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS f0 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = f0."Id"
) AS s ON p1."Id" = s."ProductsId"
ORDER BY p1."Id", s."ProductImageFilesId", s."ProductsId"

2025-08-04 01:24:16.849 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (6ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT count(*)::int
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-08-04 01:24:16.900 +03:00 [WRN] The query uses a row limiting operator ('Skip'/'Take') without an 'OrderBy' operator. This may lead to unpredictable results. If the 'Distinct' operator is used after 'OrderBy', then make sure to use the 'OrderBy' operator after 'Distinct' as the ordering would otherwise get erased.
2025-08-04 01:24:16.903 +03:00 [WRN] The query uses a row limiting operator ('Skip'/'Take') without an 'OrderBy' operator. This may lead to unpredictable results. If the 'Distinct' operator is used after 'OrderBy', then make sure to use the 'OrderBy' operator after 'Distinct' as the ordering would otherwise get erased.
2025-08-04 01:24:17.023 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (7ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT p1."Id", p1."Name", p1."Price", p1."Stock", p1."CreatedDate", p1."UpdatedDate", s."Id", s."CreatedDate", s."Discriminator", s."FileName", s."Path", s."Storage", s."Showcase", s."ProductImageFilesId", s."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS p1
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT f0."Id", f0."CreatedDate", f0."Discriminator", f0."FileName", f0."Path", f0."Storage", f0."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS f0 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = f0."Id"
) AS s ON p1."Id" = s."ProductsId"
ORDER BY p1."Id", s."ProductImageFilesId", s."ProductsId"

2025-08-04 01:27:18.201 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT count(*)::int
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-08-04 01:27:18.211 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT p1."Id", p1."Name", p1."Price", p1."Stock", p1."CreatedDate", p1."UpdatedDate", s."Id", s."CreatedDate", s."Discriminator", s."FileName", s."Path", s."Storage", s."Showcase", s."ProductImageFilesId", s."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS p1
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT f0."Id", f0."CreatedDate", f0."Discriminator", f0."FileName", f0."Path", f0."Storage", f0."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS f0 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = f0."Id"
) AS s ON p1."Id" = s."ProductsId"
ORDER BY p1."Id", s."ProductImageFilesId", s."ProductsId"

SELECT count(*)::int
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-08-04 01:27:40.804 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT p1."Id", p1."Name", p1."Price", p1."Stock", p1."CreatedDate", p1."UpdatedDate", s."Id", s."CreatedDate", s."Discriminator", s."FileName", s."Path", s."Storage", s."Showcase", s."ProductImageFilesId", s."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS p1
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT f0."Id", f0."CreatedDate", f0."Discriminator", f0."FileName", f0."Path", f0."Storage", f0."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS f0 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = f0."Id"
) AS s ON p1."Id" = s."ProductsId"
ORDER BY p1."Id", s."ProductImageFilesId", s."ProductsId"

    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS p1
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT f0."Id", f0."CreatedDate", f0."Discriminator", f0."FileName", f0."Path", f0."Storage", f0."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0

2025-08-04 01:28:18.750 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (5ms) [Parameters=[@__Parse_0='?' (DbType = Guid)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT s0."Id", s0."CreatedDate", s0."Discriminator", s0."FileName", s0."Path", s0."Storage", s0."Showcase", s0."ProductImageFilesId", s0."ProductsId", s0."Id0", s1."ProductImageFilesId", s1."ProductsId", s1."Id", s1."CreatedDate", s1."Name", s1."Price", s1."Stock", s1."UpdatedDate", s0."CreatedDate0", s0."Name", s0."Price", s0."Stock", s0."UpdatedDate"
FROM (
    SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase", s."Id" AS "Id0", s."CreatedDate" AS "CreatedDate0", s."Name", s."Price", s."Stock", s."UpdatedDate", s."ProductImageFilesId", s."ProductsId"
    FROM "Files" AS f
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT p0."Id", p0."CreatedDate", p0."Name", p0."Price", p0."Stock", p0."UpdatedDate", p."ProductImageFilesId", p."ProductsId"
        FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p
        INNER JOIN "Products" AS p0 ON p."ProductsId" = p0."Id"
    ) AS s ON f."Id" = s."ProductImageFilesId"
    WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile' AND s."Id" = @__Parse_0 AND f."Showcase"
    LIMIT 1
) AS s0
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p1."ProductImageFilesId", p1."ProductsId", p2."Id", p2."CreatedDate", p2."Name", p2."Price", p2."Stock", p2."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p1

2025-08-04 01:29:03.424 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT count(*)::int
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-08-04 01:29:03.430 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT p1."Id", p1."Name", p1."Price", p1."Stock", p1."CreatedDate", p1."UpdatedDate", s."Id", s."CreatedDate", s."Discriminator", s."FileName", s."Path", s."Storage", s."Showcase", s."ProductImageFilesId", s."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS p1
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT f0."Id", f0."CreatedDate", f0."Discriminator", f0."FileName", f0."Path", f0."Storage", f0."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS f0 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = f0."Id"
) AS s ON p1."Id" = s."ProductsId"
ORDER BY p1."Id", s."ProductImageFilesId", s."ProductsId"

2025-08-04 01:29:42.464 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT count(*)::int
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-08-04 01:29:42.471 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT p1."Id", p1."Name", p1."Price", p1."Stock", p1."CreatedDate", p1."UpdatedDate", s."Id", s."CreatedDate", s."Discriminator", s."FileName", s."Path", s."Storage", s."Showcase", s."ProductImageFilesId", s."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS p1
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT f0."Id", f0."CreatedDate", f0."Discriminator", f0."FileName", f0."Path", f0."Storage", f0."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS f0 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = f0."Id"
) AS s ON p1."Id" = s."ProductsId"
ORDER BY p1."Id", s."ProductImageFilesId", s."ProductsId"
